PerfectNetExp.abs: ...问题层层转化为一个与原问题相似的规模较小的问题来求解，递归（recursion）策略只需少量的程序就可描述出解题过程所需要的多次重复计算，大大地减少了程序的代码量。递归（recursion）的能力在于用有限的语句来定义对象的无限集合。一般来说，递归（recursion）需要有边界条件、递归（recursion）前进段和递归（recursion）返回段。当边界条件不满足时，递归（recursion）前进；当边界条件满足时，递归（recursion）返.
讲递回(recursion)的时候，老师一步一步在黑板上把整个递回的流程trace给我们看。 小考跟期中笔试，就直接要我们在纸上写C语言 …
未分类 - - Nicolas’ Blog - Upholstery ... rectangular a. 矩形的 recursion 循环 recursive a. 递归的，循环的.
递字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 递补〖 fillvacanciesintheproperorder〗 递归，递推〖 recursion〗 递降〖 descendstepbystep〗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1930s: from late Latin recursio(n-), from recurrere 'run back' (see recur)

means.word_mean: 1. (mathematics) an expression such that each term is generated by repeating a particular mathematical operation

auth_sentence.content: There's more to language than recursion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's more to language than recursion.

auth_sentence.content: Or search Google for recursion and click the Did you mean?

auth_sentence.content: But in Chomsky Mark II, or Mark III, or Mark VII, he all of a sudden said that the only thing unique to language is recursion.
